GSD.product_version: versions from v5.8 to before v5.10.122
GSD.description:
net: ethernet: ti: am65-cpsw-nuss: Fix some refcount leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.122 by commit f7ba2cc57f404d2d9f26fb85bd3833d35a477829, it was introduced in version v5.8 by commit b1f66a5bee07adaab218fb98800928185e5f0f18. For more details please see the references link.
